## **Generate Time Series Data**

---

### **Random Walk**

```{r a, comment=NA, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, fig.width=9}

library(TTR)

n = 1000
w = rnorm(n, sd = 1)
x.t = 0

for (i in 2:n) {
  x.t[i] = x.t[i-1] + w[i]
}

plot.ts(x.t, main = "Random Walk")



n = 1000
w = rnorm(n, sd = 1)
x.t = 0

for (i in 2:n) {
  x.t[i] = .1 + .9*x.t[i-1] + w[i]
}

plot.ts(x.t, main = "Stationary Time Series")
lines(SMA(x.t, 100), col = "blue", lwd = 3)




ylab = "Generated Series"

plot(arima.sim(n = 200, model = list(order = c(0, 0, 0))), 
     main = "White Noise", ylab = ylab)


plot(arima.sim(n = 200, model = list(order = c(1, 1, 0), ar = .1)))
plot(arima.sim(n = 200, model = list(order = c(1, 1, 0), ar = .5)))
plot(arima.sim(n = 200, model = list(order = c(1, 1, 0), ar = .9)))


```
